title: Harmony’s SCP Wiki Author Page(est. 2021)
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:scp-trans-pride |trans-pride-logo= --] |trans-pride-footer= --]]]



= {{The graphic depicted in the image is of Canadian actor James Doohan, as he appeared in his role as Scotty on the television programme "Star Trek" produced by Desilou Studios in the 1960's. Doohan's Scotty was the first to use the iconic catchphrase seen in all subsequent depictions of the character, "I'm giving her all she's got, Captain!" which is an in-universe vocalization most often directed towards James T. Kirk(Depicted by American actor William Shatner) in reference to the condition of the fictional United Federation of Species' //Constitution//-Class Starship USS //Enterprise//(NCC-1701).[[footnote]]The protagonist and primary setting of the program, respectively.[[/footnote]] ,,Image sourced from the [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Riverside,_Iowa_Star_Trek_Posters_-_Beam_Me_Up_Scotty_(25060010965).jpg CC 2.0], originally titled” Riverside, Iowa Star Trek Posters - Beam Me Up Scotty “ by Tony Webster from Minneapolis, Minnesota, United States. That image is identical to the one uploaded by Harmony to this page(pixelatedharmonyauthorpage).,,}}
